thread.title: Great location but not great service
thread.title_full: Great location but not great service - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jerrilyner
title: Great location but not great service
text: We loved the location of the Doubletree, the size of the rooms, and the helpfulness of the concierge's desk. The front desk was friendly and helpful, except for when I checked out. However, there was no room service and the wait staff was not very friendly in the restaurant. The rooms are nice and large but furniture is worn. The beds are very comfortable. Wifi would cut on and off. We would stay there again because of room size and location, but they do need to update and somehow get room service again.
